description.narrative: (Nigeria): The activity supports the long-term stability of Nigeria's electoral institutions. The activity provides demand-driven assistance to the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) and other election management bodies to strengthen their professionalism and capacity, leading to greater public confidence in election outcomes. Initiatives will train permanent INEC staff for off-cycle gubernatorial elections and continue the implementation of its strategic plan for the 2019 general elections. The activity will provide technical assistance to INEC to: improve voter register accuracy; develop more effective electoral dispute resolution mechanisms; improve new technology such as biometric card readers; strengthen internal efficiency and knowledge management; and provide voter education outreach to marginalized populations.
